notes: ENHANCEMENT: Expanded `mock-data.js` to include more comprehensive event and lap time data for all user profiles.
ENHANCEMENT: Updated the database seeding logic in `app.py` to correctly handle and create lap time records.
FEATURE: Added a 'Manual Entry' checkbox to the vehicle forms, allowing users to input vehicle year, make, and model as text strings.
FIX: Implemented an `onerror` attribute on vehicle image tags to display a default SVG icon if a photo URL is broken or invalid.
ENHANCEMENT: Expanded `mock-data.js` to include an 'AdminRacer' profile for more comprehensive testing.
ENHANCEMENT: The new mock profile includes data to test shared tracks, Raceday flags, and lap time submissions.
FIX: Corrected the `index.html` file to include the 'Data Management & Seeding' section in the Developer Mode UI, which was previously missing.
FIX: Resolved a TypeError on page load by moving the Data Management event listeners in `admin.js` to ensure they are only attached after the Developer Mode elements are rendered.
FIX: Resolved a JavaScript module import error by adding the missing `MOCK_VEHICLES` export to `mock-data.js`.
ENHANCEMENT: The mock vehicle data now includes `garageName` for more realistic dev mode display.
